name: Lanceon
description: Lanceon is a hardy and determined pokemon that spends its days darting through tall grasslands in search of adventure. Its body is host to a shining lance, which it proudly wields against any potential peril. Its Charge and Pound abilities make it a fierce opponent in battle, and its agility makes it a quick and formidable foe across all terrains. Lanceon is ever-ready for any challenge and never backs down from a fight.
image_prompt: Lanceon::0 a young neutral-type monkey pokemon::1.8, holding a shiny lance, in a grassland environment, faded prismatic bokeh background, anime sketch with watercolor --niji --ar 3:2
